channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP-Ban
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP-Ban

item.title: CVE-2022-4260|2024-08-03T01:34:49.926Z -- unknown -- wp-ban
item.description: The WP-Ban WordPress plugin before 1.69.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
